column6: you have either unlocked a mystical secret to immortality
column8: transformed into an avatar of nature
column9: or been granted immunity to the ravages of time by some higher power."
column10: "Rooted in a superantural means of your choice
column11: you become immune to the passage of time and the effects of old age. You do not age and cannot be harmed by magic that causes aging. You can choose to age in appearance
column13: but you can also choose to continually appear the same age."
